title: Spectromancer.CrackFiX
description:
Replace InitStartMenu.txt with the one in your Spectromancer/Scripts directory
Replace bgnd2.dds with the one in your Spectromancer/Images/Loading directory


NOTE:Fixed The Menu Buttons Not Appearing Issue

1.Single Player Game =>Works Fine
2.Campaign           =>Works Fine
3.Multiplayer        =>Hot Seat=>Working Fine
                     =>Local Network =>Working Fine
                     =>Online =>Stops On 2nd turn ;/
